verses.kjv: The book of the generation of Jesus Christ, the son of David, the son of Abraham.
verses.ct: This is the record of the ancestry of Jesus Christ, a descendant of David, who was a descendant of Abraham.

verses.kjv: Abraham begat Isaac; and Isaac begat Jacob; and Jacob begat Judas and his brethren;
verses.ct: Abraham became the father of Isaac, Isaac became the father of Jacob, and Jacob became the father of Judas and his brothers.

verses.kjv: And Judas begat Phares and Zara of Thamar; and Phares begat Esrom; and Esrom begat Aram;
verses.ct: Judas became the father of Phares and Zara by Thamar, Phares became the father of Esrom, and Esrom became the father of Aram.

verses.kjv: And Aram begat Aminadab; and Aminadab begat Naasson; and Naasson begat Salmon;
verses.ct: Aram became the father of Aminadab, Aminadab became the father of Naasson, and Naasson became the father of Salmon.

verses.kjv: And Salmon begat Booz of Rachab; and Booz begat Obed of Ruth; and Obed begat Jesse;
verses.ct: Salmon became the father of Booz by Rachab, Booz became the father of Obed by Ruth, and Obed became the father of Jesse.

verses.kjv: And Jesse begat David the king; and David the king begat Solomon of her that had been the wife of Urias;
verses.ct: Jesse became the father of King David, and King David became the father of Solomon by the former wife of Urias.

verses.kjv: And Solomon begat Roboam; and Roboam begat Abia; and Abia begat Asa;
verses.ct: Solomon became the father of Roboam, Roboam became the father of Abia, and Abia became the father of Asa.

verses.kjv: And Asa begat Josaphat; and Josaphat begat Joram; and Joram begat Ozias;
verses.ct: Asa became the father of Josaphat, Josaphat became the father of Joram, and Joram became the father of Ozias.

verses.kjv: And Ozias begat Joatham; and Joatham begat Achaz; and Achaz begat Ezekias;
verses.ct: Ozias became the father of Joatham, Joatham became the father of Achaz, and Achaz became the father of Ezekias.

verses.kjv: And Ezekias begat Manasses; and Manasses begat Amon; and Amon begat Josias;
verses.ct: Ezekias became the father of Manasses, Manasses became the father of Amon, and Amon became the father of Josias.

verses.kjv: And Josias begat Jechonias and his brethren, about the time they were carried away to Babylon:
verses.ct: Josias became the father of Jechonias and his brothers, around the time the people were taken into exile in Babylon.

verses.kjv: And after they were brought to Babylon, Jechonias begat Salathiel; and Salathiel begat Zorobabel;
verses.ct: After the exile to Babylon, Jechonias became the father of Salathiel, and Salathiel became the father of Zorobabel.

verses.kjv: And Zorobabel begat Abiud; and Abiud begat Eliakim; and Eliakim begat Azor;
verses.ct: Zorobabel became the father of Abiud, Abiud became the father of Eliakim, and Eliakim became the father of Azor.

verses.kjv: And Azor begat Sadoc; and Sadoc begat Achim; and Achim begat Eliud;
verses.ct: Azor became the father of Sadoc, Sadoc became the father of Achim, and Achim became the father of Eliud.

verses.kjv: And Eliud begat Eleazar; and Eleazar begat Matthan; and Matthan begat Jacob;
verses.ct: Eliud became the father of Eleazar, Eleazar became the father of Matthan, and Matthan became the father of Jacob.

verses.kjv: And Jacob begat Joseph the husband of Mary, of whom was born Jesus, who is called Christ.
verses.ct: Jacob became the father of Joseph, the husband of Mary, and Mary was the mother of Jesus, who is called Christ.

verses.kjv: So all the generations from Abraham to David are fourteen generations; and from David until the carrying away into Babylon are fourteen generations; and from the carrying away into Babylon unto Christ are fourteen generations.
verses.ct: So there were 14 generations from Abraham to David, 14 generations from David to the exile in Babylon, and 14 generations from the exile in Babylon to Christ.

verses.kjv: Now the birth of Jesus Christ was on this wise: When as his mother Mary was espoused to Joseph, before they came together, she was found with child of the Holy Ghost.
verses.ct: Here is how the birth of Jesus Christ happened: His mother Mary was engaged to Joseph, but before they came together as husband and wife, she was discovered to be pregnant through the Holy Spirit.

verses.kjv: Then Joseph her husband, being a just man, and not willing to make her a publick example, was minded to put her away privily.
verses.ct: Joseph, her fiancé, was a good and honorable man. He didn't want to disgrace her publicly, so he planned to quietly break off the engagement.

verses.kjv: But while he thought on these things, behold, the angel of the LORD appeared unto him in a dream, saying, Joseph, thou son of David, fear not to take unto thee Mary thy wife: for that which is conceived in her is of the Holy Ghost.
verses.ct: But while he was considering this, an angel of the Lord appeared to him in a dream and said, "Joseph, descendant of David, don't be afraid to take Mary as your wife. The child she is carrying was conceived by the Holy Spirit."

verses.kjv: And she shall bring forth a son, and thou shalt call his name JESUS: for he shall save his people from their sins.
verses.ct: "She will give birth to a son, and you are to name him JESUS, because he will save his people from their sins."

verses.kjv: Now all this was done, that it might be fulfilled which was spoken of the Lord by the prophet, saying,
verses.ct: All of this took place to fulfill what the Lord had spoken through the prophet:

verses.kjv: Behold, a virgin shall be with child, and shall bring forth a son, and they shall call his name Emmanuel, which being interpreted is, God with us.
verses.ct: "Look, a virgin will become pregnant and give birth to a son, and they will call him Emmanuel" — which means "God with us."

verses.kjv: Then Joseph being raised from sleep did as the angel of the Lord had bidden him, and took unto him his wife:
verses.ct: When Joseph woke up, he did exactly what the angel of the Lord had told him and took Mary as his wife.

verses.kjv: And knew her not till she had brought forth her firstborn son: and he called his name JESUS.
verses.ct: But he did not have relations with her until after she gave birth to her firstborn son. And he named him JESUS.
